import React from 'react'; const HomePage = () => { return (
{/* Header */}

My Website

  • Home
  • Another Page
{/* Hero Section */}

Welcome to My Website

This is a simple example of a homepage using React and Tailwind CSS. Explore our features and enjoy your stay!

Get Started
{/* Features Section */}

Features

Feature 1

Description of feature 1. Highlight the benefits and unique aspects.

Feature 2

Description of feature 2. Highlight the benefits and unique aspects.

Feature 3

Description of feature 3. Highlight the benefits and unique aspects.

{/* Footer */}

© {new Date().getFullYear()} My Website. All rights reserved.

); } export default HomePage;
